entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
